editorial.body: Welcome to the Fall 2025 edition of the New Heart Global Family Newsletter. As our family grows, we celebrate what the Lord is doing across nations and generations.

serve.note: These bless candidates and teams with encouragement and support.

ariel.name: Ariel Sabag
ariel.blurb: Born into an Orthodox family… I searched the prophecies and met Jesus the Messiah…
ariel.full: My sister's profound experience with New Heart 52 in Israel had a deep impact on me…

ji.name: Ji Yeowoon
ji.blurb: 22 children, 10 teachers… it felt like mission — and the Spirit held us.

kyungjin.name: Kyungjin Park
kyungjin.blurb: Parents and children both received “one new heart” by the Spirit.
